alert.note: Alert for Clarke (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 7:40PM CST until February 19 at 2:40PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Chickasawhay River At Enterprise affecting Clarke County. Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Chickasawhay River At Enterprise. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 25.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Chickasawhay River Enterprise 25.0 25.2 Sat 7 pm CST 22.9 21.1 20.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 945 AM CST.
